verses.plain: Wisdom lifteth up the head of him that is of low degree, and maketh him to sit among great men.

tokens.t: Wisdom lifteth up the head of him that is of low degree, and maketh him to sit among great men.

verses.plain: Commend not a man for his beauty; neither abhor a man for his outward appearance.

tokens.t: Commend not a man for his beauty; neither abhor a man for his outward appearance.

verses.plain: The bee is little among such as fly; but her fruit is the chief of sweet things.

tokens.t: The bee is little among such as fly; but her fruit is the chief of sweet things.

verses.plain: Boast not of thy clothing and raiment, and exalt not thyself in the day of honour: for the works of the Lord are wonderful, and his works among men are hidden.

tokens.t: Boast not of thy clothing and raiment, and exalt not thyself in the day of honour: for the works of the Lord are wonderful, and his works among men are hidden.

verses.plain: Many kings have sat down upon the ground; and one that was never thought of hath worn the crown.

tokens.t: Many kings have sat down upon the ground; and one that was never thought of hath worn the crown.

verses.plain: Many mighty men have been greatly disgraced; and the honourable delivered into other men’s hands.

tokens.t: Many mighty men have been greatly disgraced; and the honourable delivered into other men’s hands.

verses.plain: Blame not before thou hast examined the truth: understand first, and then rebuke.

tokens.t: Blame not before thou hast examined the truth: understand first, and then rebuke.

verses.plain: Answer not before thou hast heard the cause: neither interrupt men in the midst of their talk.

tokens.t: Answer not before thou hast heard the cause: neither interrupt men in the midst of their talk.

verses.plain: Strive not in a matter that concerneth thee not; and sit not in judgment with sinners.

tokens.t: Strive not in a matter that concerneth thee not; and sit not in judgment with sinners.

verses.plain: My son, meddle not with many matters: for if thou meddle much, thou shalt not be innocent; and if thou follow after, thou shalt not obtain, neither shalt thou escape by fleeing.

tokens.t: My son, meddle not with many matters: for if thou meddle much, thou shalt not be innocent; and if thou follow after, thou shalt not obtain, neither shalt thou escape by fleeing.

verses.plain: There is one that laboureth, and taketh pains, and maketh haste, and is so much the more behind.

tokens.t: There is one that laboureth, and taketh pains, and maketh haste, and is so much the more behind.

verses.plain: Again, there is another that is slow, and hath need of help, wanting ability, and full of poverty; yet the eye of the Lord looked upon him for good, and set him up from his low estate,

tokens.t: Again, there is another that is slow, and hath need of help, wanting ability, and full of poverty; yet the eye of the Lord looked upon him for good, and set him up from his low estate,

verses.plain: And lifted up his head from misery; so that many that saw it marvelled at him.

tokens.t: And lifted up his head from misery; so that many that saw it marvelled at him.

verses.plain: Prosperity and adversity, life and death, poverty and riches, come of the Lord.

tokens.t: Prosperity and adversity, life and death, poverty and riches, come of the Lord.

verses.plain: Wisdom, knowledge, and understanding of the law, are of the Lord: love, and the way of good works, are from him.

tokens.t: Wisdom, knowledge, and understanding of the law, are of the Lord: love, and the way of good works, are from him.

verses.plain: Error and darkness had their beginning together with sinners: and evil shall wax old with them that glory therein.

tokens.t: Error and darkness had their beginning together with sinners: and evil shall wax old with them that glory therein.

verses.plain: The gift of the Lord remaineth with the ungodly, and his favour bringeth prosperity for ever.

tokens.t: The gift of the Lord remaineth with the ungodly, and his favour bringeth prosperity for ever.

verses.plain: There is that waxeth rich by his wariness and pinching, and this is the portion of his reward:

tokens.t: There is that waxeth rich by his wariness and pinching, and this is the portion of his reward:

verses.plain: Whereas he saith, I have found rest, and now will eat continually of my goods; and yet he knoweth not what time shall come upon him, and that he must leave those things to others, and die.

tokens.t: Whereas he saith, I have found rest, and now will eat continually of my goods; and yet he knoweth not what time shall come upon him, and that he must leave those things to others, and die.

verses.plain: Be stedfast in thy covenant, and be conversant therein, and wax old in thy work.

tokens.t: Be stedfast in thy covenant, and be conversant therein, and wax old in thy work.

verses.plain: Marvel not at the works of sinners; but trust in the Lord, and abide in thy labour: for it is an easy thing in the sight of the Lord on the sudden to make a poor man rich.

tokens.t: Marvel not at the works of sinners; but trust in the Lord, and abide in thy labour: for it is an easy thing in the sight of the Lord on the sudden to make a poor man rich.

verses.plain: The blessing of the Lord is in the reward of the godly, and suddenly he maketh his blessing flourish.

tokens.t: The blessing of the Lord is in the reward of the godly, and suddenly he maketh his blessing flourish.

verses.plain: Say not, What profit is there of my service? and what good things shall I have hereafter?

tokens.t: Say not, What profit is there of my service? and what good things shall I have hereafter?

verses.plain: Again, say not, I have enough, and possess many things, and what evil shall I have hereafter?

tokens.t: Again, say not, I have enough, and possess many things, and what evil shall I have hereafter?

verses.plain: In the day of prosperity there is a forgetfulness of affliction: and in the day of affliction there is no more remembrance of prosperity.

tokens.t: In the day of prosperity there is a forgetfulness of affliction: and in the day of affliction there is no more remembrance of prosperity.

verses.plain: For it is an easy thing unto the Lord in the day of death to reward a man according to his ways.

tokens.t: For it is an easy thing unto the Lord in the day of death to reward a man according to his ways.

verses.plain: The affliction of an hour maketh a man forget pleasure: and in his end his deeds shall be discovered.

tokens.t: The affliction of an hour maketh a man forget pleasure: and in his end his deeds shall be discovered.

verses.plain: Judge none blessed before his death: for a man shall be known in his children.

tokens.t: Judge none blessed before his death: for a man shall be known in his children.

verses.plain: Bring not every man into thine house: for the deceitful man hath many trains.

tokens.t: Bring not every man into thine house: for the deceitful man hath many trains.

verses.plain: Like as a partridge taken and kept in a cage, so is the heart of the proud; and like as a spy, watcheth he for thy fall:

tokens.t: Like as a partridge taken
in a cage, so is the heart of the proud; and like as a spy, watcheth he for thy fall:

verses.plain: For he lieth in wait, and turneth good into evil, and in things worthy praise will lay blame upon thee.

tokens.t: For he lieth in wait, and turneth good into evil, and in things worthy praise will lay blame upon thee.

verses.plain: Of a spark of fire a heap of coals is kindled: and a sinful man layeth wait for blood.

tokens.t: Of a spark of fire a heap of coals is kindled: and a sinful man layeth wait for blood.

verses.plain: Take heed of a mischievous man, for he worketh wickedness; lest he bring upon thee a perpetual blot.

tokens.t: Take heed of a mischievous man, for he worketh wickedness; lest he bring upon thee a perpetual blot.

verses.plain: Receive a stranger into thine house, and he will disturb thee, and turn thee out of thine own.

tokens.t: Receive a stranger into thine house, and he will disturb thee, and turn thee out of thine own.
